Uses of Class
stincmale.ratmex.doc.ThreadSafe

  • Packages that use ThreadSafe 
    Package Description
    stincmale.ratmex
    The root package of RatMeX library.
    stincmale.ratmex.executor
    Contains tools for executing tasks with a fixed rate.
    stincmale.ratmex.meter
    Contains tools for rate measuring.

    • Uses of ThreadSafe in stincmale.ratmex

      Classes in stincmale.ratmex with annotations of type ThreadSafe 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  NanosComparator
      A Comparator that compares nanoseconds according to System.nanoTime() specification.

    • Uses of ThreadSafe in stincmale.ratmex.executor

      Classes in stincmale.ratmex.executor with annotations of type ThreadSafe 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  RateMeasuringExecutorService<C extends ScheduledTaskConfig<E>,E extends RateMeasuredEvent>
      A rate-measuring executor service which not only executes tasks with a fixed rate, but also measures the actual rate completion of the tasks and allows one to monitor the rate and react if the executor has failed to conform to the target rate.
      class  SubmitterWorkerRateMeasuringExecutorService<C extends SubmitterWorkerScheduledTaskConfig<E,SRS,WRS>,E extends SubmitterWorkerRateMeasuredEvent<SRS,WRS>,SRS,WRS>
      This RateMeasuringExecutorService assigns two roles to its threads: submitter and worker.

    • Uses of ThreadSafe in stincmale.ratmex.meter

      Classes in stincmale.ratmex.meter with annotations of type ThreadSafe 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AtomicLongTicksCounter
      This TicksCounter uses AtomicLong field to store its value.
      class  AtomikLongArray
      This concurrent implementation of LongArray is just a wrapper over an AtomicLongArray.
      class  ConcurrentNavigableMapRateMeter
      A thread-safe implementation of AbstractNavigableMapRateMeter, which uses ConcurrentSkipListMap implementation of NavigableMap (this might be changed in the future).
      interface  ConcurrentRateMeterStats
      Stats gathered by a thread-safe implementation of RateMeter which implements RateMeter.tick(long, long) in a relaxed way, that allows come ticks to be registered at an incorrect instant for example.
      class  ConcurrentResettableRateMeter<S>  
      class  ConcurrentRingBufferRateMeter
      A thread-safe implementation of AbstractRingBufferRateMeter, which uses AtomikLongArray implementation of LongArray (this might be changed in the future).
      interface  LockStrategy
      A lock abstraction which allows implementations with different semantics, e.g.
      class  LongAdderTicksCounter
      This TicksCounter uses LongAdder field to store its value.
      class  ParkWaitStrategy
      This implementation of WaitStrategy combines exponential backoff and parking.
      class  SpinLockStrategy
      This implementation of LockStrategy does not distinguish shared and exclusive locking.
      class  StampedLockStrategy
      This implementation of LockStrategy uses StampedLock and directly dispatches all methods to analogs in StampedLock.
      interface  WaitStrategy
      An abstraction which allows implementations of different approaches to block on a condition.
      class  YieldWaitStrategy
      This implementation of WaitStrategy just spins calling Thread.yield() between tests of a condition.
